title: Land for sale in Galle, Boossa
details: Excellent location with 100 meters to the Galle road and Facing to the Sea. Sea can be seen in upstairs. Calm & quiet,Highly Residential area with full of security. Fully tiled & newly built complete house with French windows. Open varanda with car parking. 2 bedrooms,1 bathroom,kitchen,dinning area Pipe born water with over head water tank & electricity. Clear deeds. Railway station 15 Minutes drive to Galle City. Land is surrounded by a Wall. 36 Perches.**ideal place for a villa
